metadata.proposal_title: Scaling Multimodal Foundation Models for Physical Intelligence

checks.name: Project & Usage Alignment
checks.notes: Required in O1-CompoSE for training 3D object generation models and developing text-to-3D synthesis capabilities.

checks.notes: Required for training generalizable robotic manipulation policies, imitation learning research, and Vision-Language-Action (VLA) model development across multiple robot embodiments.
